name: AddItemToPortfolio
description:
Add an item to a portfolio in Asana.

Use this tool to add an item to a specified portfolio in Asana. Requires 'portfolios:write' permission.

parameters.name: portfolio_unique_id
parameters.description: Globally unique identifier for the portfolio to which the item will be added.

value_schema.description: Globally unique identifier for the portfolio.

parameters.name: item_to_add_to_portfolio
parameters.description: The ID of the item to be added to the Asana portfolio.

value_schema.description: The item to add to the portfolio.

parameters.name: insert_item_before_id
parameters.description: ID of an existing portfolio item. The new item will be placed before this item. Cannot be used with `insert_after_id`.

value_schema.description: An id of an item in this portfolio. The new item will be added before the one specified here. `insert_before` and `insert_after` parameters cannot both be specified.

parameters.name: add_after_item_id
parameters.description: ID of an item in the portfolio where the new item will be added after. Cannot be used with 'add_before_item_id'.

value_schema.description: An id of an item in this portfolio. The new item will be added after the one specified here. `insert_before` and `insert_after` parameters cannot both be specified.

parameters.name: enable_pretty_output
parameters.description: Enable pretty JSON formatting for debugging. This increases response size and processing time.

value_schema.description:
Provides “pretty” output.
Provides the response in a “pretty” format. In the case of JSON this means doing proper line breaking and indentation to make it readable. This will take extra time and increase the response size so it is advisable only to use this during debugging.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the asana API.

parameters.name: opt_pretty
parameters.description:
Provides “pretty” output.
Provides the response in a “pretty” format. In the case of JSON this means doing proper line breaking and indentation to make it readable. This will take extra time and increase the response size so it is advisable only to use this during debugging.

value_schema.description:
Provides “pretty” output.
Provides the response in a “pretty” format. In the case of JSON this means doing proper line breaking and indentation to make it readable. This will take extra time and increase the response size so it is advisable only to use this during debugging.

parameters.name: portfolio_gid
parameters.description: Globally unique identifier for the portfolio.

value_schema.description: Globally unique identifier for the portfolio.

parameters.name: data.item
parameters.description: The item to add to the portfolio.

value_schema.description: The item to add to the portfolio.

parameters.name: data.insert_before
parameters.description: An id of an item in this portfolio. The new item will be added before the one specified here. `insert_before` and `insert_after` parameters cannot both be specified.

value_schema.description: An id of an item in this portfolio. The new item will be added before the one specified here. `insert_before` and `insert_after` parameters cannot both be specified.

parameters.name: data.insert_after
parameters.description: An id of an item in this portfolio. The new item will be added after the one specified here. `insert_before` and `insert_after` parameters cannot both be specified.

value_schema.description: An id of an item in this portfolio. The new item will be added after the one specified here. `insert_before` and `insert_after` parameters cannot both be specified.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
